text: Che Yesu ŵajanjile, “Kwa ligongo lya chikulupi chenu chachinandi. Ngunsalila isyene, mwaŵaga ni chikulupi atamuno chaŵaga chachinandi chisau mbeju jajinandi nnope jajikuŵilanjikwa haladali, chinkombole kuchisalila achi chitumbi chi, ‘Ntyoche apa njaule ako,’ nombecho chichityoche. Ngalipagwa liloŵe lyangalikombolecheka kukwenu.”
